message.body: Hi Margot, my name is meg and I'm the driver for tonight's lesson. We will leave at 6:45 from pem arch. See you there!

Hi Meg! I can come to Bryn Mawr tonight, but I figured I'd just ask if there's any way to get picked up from Haverford in the future? because of the blue bus schedule, it'll take half an hour for Haverford folk to walk to the station, get to Bryn Mawr, a
Hey! I can do that in the future, if you can come out here tonight, see you soon
hey, I see someone in a car by pem arch... is that you? I don't want to go say hi if it's a complete stranger :P
Ha ha yeah it's me
Hi Meg, I was just wondering when/where I should meet you tonight for riding. Thanks!
I will text you, I can just meet you where I dropped you off last week
It will be around 6:30
Thanks, see you then :)
Be there in five mins
See you at 6:30 outside of Tritton? :)
Also, do you think there will be enough time for me to run to Erdman for a takeout box while we wait for ppl to show at BMC?
Yeah that should be fine, see you soon
I'm here
oh goodness I'm sorry give me second!
I'm in the emergency lane haha
coming!
Are you coming?
hey Megan, what's our timing tonight? still 6:30?
Yes, I'm on my way to Haverford, I will call when out front
okay! I'll be out there at 6:30
Here
See you at 6:30!
Here
hey meg, go on without me-- I'm sick. sorry!
Ack ok, give me a heads up next time. Feel better!
so, so sorry! have fun!
Hey, just a heads up, my babysitter called out sick for tonight, so I'm not going to go. I sent Julie a message asking if she could get you guys, I will let you know what I hear. Sorry to miss it!

Aw, okay! Also, let me know if you want to make up any lost lessons with me-- I think we're supposed to re-do them after the last class, and I've missed two. I'll ask Julie about it as well though, because I don't know the details.
Yes, this will be my second missed one too! Lets figure out a time
hey Meg! we still have riding tonight, right?
Yes, be there at 6:30. Also some one is joining our ride tonight. See you soon

hey, it's Margot. my classes end at 4 every day, but I'll need to be on campus for dinner at some point (5:30-8:00 for HC), so I can't leave any earlier than 6... although our current 6:30 timing is preferred. Mondays and Wednesdays work best for me, but
good to know, thanks.
also, don't we need to contact the barn to see when our/a instructor would be available too?
Hey, I can't get you from haverford today, but if you can blue bus here, I can stll take you back tonight
okay, thanks for letting me know. see you then!
hey meg, I just contacted Julie too! I can't make it to any lesson tonight (finals before finals week UGH) and I'm leaving next Saturday...
but other than Mon & Tues 2-3 and Mon 8:30-9:30, I'm completely free!
I have two lessons to make up... ideally :P and unless you've made up any lessons in the meantime, I think you do too-- we had missed the same number last time we checked

Yeah this week is a nightmare! I think I only had two to make up, because I went thru my text history and I only called out once, and Julie drove the other time I couldn't go. So last week was one, and hopefully next week will be the other. Good luck with
